author: jstrachan
msg: Added a Camel example SU, SA

author: jstrachan
msg: fixed the classloader issues so that Camel service units can find Java RouteBuilders on the classpath and load them. Also we now by default expose a simple CamelControlBus to JBI; then any JBI consumers (or Camel endpoints) can be exposed to the NMR dynamically. We also use the Camel TypeConverter stuff to go from POJO -> Source (such as if Camel messages contain a JAXB POJO etc)

author: imario
msg: allow to configure a timeout for tiemoutable scopes through the spring config

author: ate
msg: WICKET-656: New Wicket Portlet support: adding portlet support with a new WicketPortlet, WicketPortletFilter and support classes
- refactored instantiating Wicket portlet-support entry point classes a little to make the easier extendable (like for different portals).
- support for a org.apache.wicket.protocol.http.portlet.WicketPortlet.properties file on the classpath allowing keeping all portal specific configurations out of a wicket portlet application

author: davidillsley
msg: Fix for thread safety issue. Multiple puts to a standard HashMap from different threads may result in lost data
